languages.text: "Если бы на твоем месте были арбитры из твоей команды, ты бы их бросил?"
"If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"
languages.original_text: "Если бы на твоем месте были арбитры из твоей команды, ты бы их бросил?"

traits.locale_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"
"If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"
"If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"
"If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"
"If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

languages.text: 「もし君の部隊のアービトレイターが今の君と同じ立場にいたら、彼らを見捨てるのか？」
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: 「もし君の部隊のアービトレイターが今の君と同じ立場にいたら、彼らを見捨てるのか？」

languages.text: "Wenn ein Arbitrator aus Eurem Trupp in Eurer Lage wäre, würdet Ihr ihn dann im Stich lassen?"
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ein Arbitrator aus Eurem Trupp in Eurer Lage wäre, würdet Ihr ihn dann im Stich lassen?"

languages.text: « Si un arbitrator de votre escouade vous tenait le même discours, est-ce que vous l'abandonneriez ? »
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: « Si un arbitrator de votre escouade vous tenait le même discours, est-ce que vous l'abandonneriez ? »

languages.text: «Si un Arbitrator de su equipo se viese en su misma situación, ¿usted lo abandonaría?».
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: «Si un Arbitrator de su equipo se viese en su misma situación, ¿usted lo abandonaría?».

languages.text: “如果换做是你的法务官战友出了问题，你会把他们遗弃在这里吗？”
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是你的法务官战友出了问题，你会把他们遗弃在这里吗？”

languages.text: "Mangandan bir Yargıcı senin yerinde olsaydı onu terk eder miydin?"
languages.original_text: "If an Arbitrator from your squad was in your position, would you abandon them?"

traits.locale_text: "Mangandan bir Yargıcı senin yerinde olsaydı onu terk eder miydin?"
